Texto: 
fever. photophobia
surgery and antibiotics
• ct scan  shows a mixed attenuation right frontal lobe mass
• opacification frontal sinuses
• osteomyleitis right frontal bone
• mri  shows ring enhancing mass with restricted diffusion.
brain abscess (gram positive beta streptococcus)
• metastatic lesion
• abscess w/osteomyelitis (pott's puffy tumor)
• primay brain tumor
• hematoma
31 year old boy with long history of chronic sinusitis.  developed worsening headache 1 week prior to admission.  outside hospital ct scan revealed brain mass.
